files.content:
#!/usr/bin/python
# coding=utf-8
#
# <bitbar.title>Litecoin Ticker (£1GBP)</bitbar.title>
# <bitbar.version>v1.0</bitbar.version>
# <bitbar.author>impshum</bitbar.author>
# <bitbar.author.github>impshum</bitbar.author.github>
# <bitbar.desc>Displays current Litecoin price for £1 from Coinmarketcap</bitbar.desc>
# <bitbar.image>https://i.imgur.com/GUaQ8hZ.jpg/bitbar.image>
#
# by impshum

from urllib import urlopen
url = urlopen('https://coinmarketcap-nexuist.rhcloud.com/api/ltc').read()

import json
result = json.loads(url)

def flow():
    if result ['change'] > '0':
        print (' £%.4f |  color=#000000'% float(result['price']['gbp']))
    else:
        print (' £%.4f |  color=#000000'% float(result['price']['gbp']))

flow()

plugins.title: Litecoin Ticker (£1GBP)
plugins.author: impshum

authors.name: impshum
authors.bio: If it wasn't for those damn whelks!

plugins.desc: Displays current Litecoin price for £1 from Coinmarketcap

files.content:
#!/usr/bin/env python
# coding=utf-8
#
# <bitbar.title>Litecoin USD Tracker</bitbar.title>
# <bitbar.version>v2.0</bitbar.version>
# <bitbar.author>mgjo5899</bitbar.author>
# <bitbar.author.github>mgjo5899</bitbar.author.github>
# <bitbar.desc>It tracks Litecoin price in USD</bitbar.desc>
# <bitbar.image>https://i.imgur.com/OI9eD75.png</bitbar.image>
# <bitbar.dependencies>python</bitbar.dependencies>
#
# by mgjo5899

try:
	import requests
except ImportError:
  print("Need to install requests module")
  print("Type the following:")
  print("pip install requests")

import json

url = 'https://www.worldcoinindex.com/apiservice/json?key=zQ5ePYHCeRw211NEeQ8DrZMbI'
r = requests.get(url)
j = json.loads(r.text)

for market in j['Markets']:
  if 'litecoin' == market['Name'].lower():
    price = market['Price_usd']

price = "%.2f" % price

print(str(price) + " | ")

plugins.title: Litecoin USD Tracker
plugins.author: mgjo5899

authors.name: Joseph
authors.bio: Listening to Yiruma songs helps me to focus when coding :)

plugins.desc: It tracks Litecoin price in USD
